page.title: 14ROADS AND SERVICES
page.content:
In this area there is no police, fire or ambulance station but the various emergency services come from the surrounding towns in the event of any trouble or emergency.
The roads are , under normal circumstances very quiet and so are little more than very small and narrow country lanes.
In the summer and Bank holidays, however the situation can be very different and several traffic jams have been caused by this influx of traffic in the school holidays by people on their way to relatives or looking for a shortcut to a costal resort.
